title: CONTENT RULES

card.rule: Check if it is accurate information.
card.footnote:
(Fact check is a MUST! If you don't know something,
please send us an inquiry.)

card.rule:
Check if it contains sensitive
information.
card.footnote: (Make content that is not uncomfortable for all people)

card.rule:
Use your own photos & videos,
your own writings, or any sources
without copyright issues.
card.footnote:
(If you are using someone else's materials, make sure
you identify the source.)

card.rule:
Creators may only submit
works that were solely created
by themselves.

card.footnote: (Political/ Religious Issues, Gender/ Racist Content, etc.)

card.rule:
No usage of information where
the sources are unclear or their
objective facts are not guaranteed!
card.footnote:
(Fact check is a MUST! If you don't know something,
please send us an inquiry.)

card.rule:
No infringement of
other people's copyrights!
card.footnote:
(Do not use other people's photos, videos, music sources,
designs without permission)

card.rule:
Videos that were previously
submitted to other contests will
not be accepted and permitted
in this contest.

footnote: The applicant shall be accountable for all civil and penal offenses such as copyright, portrait rights, intellectual property rights (music, video, image, illustration, font, etc.) infringement, defamation, and plagiarism. If such an infringement of rights is discovered after the award has been distributed, the award and prize money shall be revoked.
